valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 3 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 4 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Rockall 987 losing its identity. New low expected 80 miles west of Rockall 979 by midnight tonight
